subject: Marketing
title: Switching Costs
description: Learn Switching Costs in one minute.

hook.text: You hate your bank but haven't switched in ten years. The hassle outweighs the pain.

discovery.text: Some brands engineer switching costs deliberately. Think ecosystems, data formats, subscriptions.

twist.text: High switching costs create retention without loyalty. Customers stay but resent it.

climax.text: The best brands reduce switching costs for competitors while earning real loyalty.

punchline.text: Retention through love beats retention through friction.

quiz.question: What is the risk of relying on high switching costs for retention?
options: Customers stay but resent it, creating fragile loyalty
Switching costs always increase customer satisfaction
High switching costs are illegal in most markets
